comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body:
> ```
> Test-Path $testDirectory | Should Be $true
> ```

you should put all of this in a beforeall block and we should be using the
we should be doing no tests in $HOME, that's why we have test drive
we should be using the setup function built-in to pester for directory and file creation

---
